Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Arizona in 2001...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/6/2004, off Rich Garces (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2004, off Scott Linebrink (STL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 5/7/2004...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Milwaukee on 9/16/2004...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2004, hitting .336 with 13 HR, 81 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2005...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 4/12/2009...
Was selected to the 2009 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Philadelphia on 5/19/2010...
Traded from Arizona to Washington on 1/31/2011 (Going to ARI: RF M. Stanton, P M. Bumgarner, P C. Carrasco. Going to WSH: C J. Mauer, 1B A. Pujols, P A. Cook)...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Traded from Washington to Kansas City on 2/12/2012 (Going to WSH: 2B D. Gordon, LF D. Muñoz, C J. Jefferies, C S. Valentino, CF F. Pie. Going to KCA: C J. Mauer)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/2012, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 4/11/2013...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/2013, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/5/2013 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 8/6/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/28/2015, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/11/2016, off Rick Ankiel (MIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2017, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Houston on 7/16/2017...
Injured on 9/5/2017 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/2/2018, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 7/26/2018...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Cleveland on 7/29/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/24/2018, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 7/1/2019...
Drove in 8 runs against Cleveland on 7/24/2019...
Injured on 9/26/2019 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 9/26/2019...
Injured on 7/2/2020 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/16/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,001 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 9/6/2021...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/6/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
